titleStmt.title: The ultimum vale of John Carleton of the Midde Temple, London, Gent. being a true description of that grand imposter, late a pretended Germane-lady.
titleStmt.author: Carleton, John, b. 1645?

notesStmt.note: "Published by the order and appointment of the aforesaid right worthy and ingenious author Mr. John Caleton."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
